```{r}
mtcars |>
  group_by(cyl) |> 
  summarise(wt = mean(wt), .groups = "drop") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = cyl, y = wt, fill = as.character(cyl))) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(name = "Cylinder") +
  theme_minimal()
```
